frameDefinitions: The Quantity of a Collection occurring in a Place has a particular Measure.
In this frame an  Agent preserves a Patient in order to prevent it from decaying.
In this frame a Patient is in a phase brought about after a change of phase.
An Entity exists at a particular Location, at a particular Time, as observed by an implicit observer.
An Entity stands out perceptually in comparison to other members of its type.
An Entity is declared to exist, generally irrespective of its position or even the possibility of its position being specified.
frameExamples: Beauty is <t>abundant</t> in a land flowing with snowmelt.
Collect up the  <t>thawed</t> water from the freezer section.
Liquid water was <t>present</t> on the surface of Mars billions of years ago.
Pilot Mountain in NC is very <t>prominent</t>.
Finally, Poland ceased to <t>exist</t> as a state for hundreds of years.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Collection</fen> whose <fen>Quantity</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Collection</fen> which is under discussion. This role is incorporated by all the lexical units in this frame.
The location in which the <fen>Collection</fen> occurs.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Collection</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Measure</fen> for the <fen>Quantity</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person performing the intentional act that leads to the preservation.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the substance in which the <fen>Patient</fen> might be  submerged to be preserved.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is organic matter that undergoes the preservation.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> preserves the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> where the preserving occurs.
The <fen>Substance</fen> is the entity which has had its phase altered.
The <fen>Entity</fen> whose existence at the <fen>Location</fen> is confirmed.
The <fen>Location</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen>. The <fen>Location</fen> is conceived as a ground for an event of inspection to determine the presense of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Entity</fen> is present at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the saliency <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
The feature of the <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion, namely perceptual salience.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular salience.
This role refers to the location where the <fen>Entity</fen> has a prominence of some <fen>Attribute</fen>.
Some entity, abstract or concrete, which is stated to exist.
A time at which the entity is in existence.
Where the <fen>Entity</fen> exists.
listRoleExamples: Maggots began to teem <fex>in his black fur</fex>.
Mr. Amber embalmed the woman in Turkey <fex>in 1922</fex>.
Mr. Amber embalmed the woman's body <fex>in Turkey</fex> in 1922.
If you are asked to search for the plus sign with red-vertical and green-horizontal elements, <fex>all the red and green plus signs</fex> may seem to become salient.
The diagram, (a frequency distribution chart) shows a <fex>prominently</fex> conspicuous region of stars that extend from the extremely bright and hot stars to the faint and cool variety.
The affection for American culture seemed more prominent <fex>last year</fex>.
